Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-4418 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 10.0.0-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-4418 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 10.0.0-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libvirt is earlier than 10.0.0-5, affected by CVE-2024-4418
